References
==========

The following software packages are used in this pipeline:

+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Software    | Website                                                        | Citation                                                            |
+=============+================================================================+=====================================================================+
| AWS CLI     | `https://github.com/aws/aws-cli                                |                                                                     |
|             | <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli>`_                             |                                                                     |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| BCFtools    | `https://github.com/samtools/bcftools                          | `doi: 10.1093/gigascience/giab008                                   |
|             | <https://github.com/samtools/bcftools>`_                       | <https://doi.org/10.1093/gigascience/giab008>`_                     |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| BWA         | `https://github.com/lh3/bwa                                    | `doi: 10.48550/arXiv.1303.3997                                      |
|             | <https://github.com/lh3/bwa>`_                                 | <https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.1303.3997>`_                        |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| conda       | `https://docs.conda.io/en/latest/                              |                                                                     |
|             | <https://docs.conda.io/en/latest/>`_                           |                                                                     |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| fastp       | `https://github.com/OpenGene/fastp                             | `doi: 10.1093/bioinformatics/bty560                                 |
|             | <https://github.com/OpenGene/fastp>`_                          | <https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/bty560>`_                   |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| FastQC      | `https://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc/    |                                                                     |
|             | <https://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc/>`_ |                                                                     |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| GATK4       | `https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk                        |                                                                     |
|             | <https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk>`_                     |                                                                     |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| matplotlib  | `https://matplotlib.org/ <https://matplotlib.org/>`_           |                                                                     |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| MultiQC     | `https://github.com/ewels/MultiQC                              | `doi: 10.1093/bioinformatics/btw354                                 |
|             | <https://github.com/ewels/MultiQC>`_                           | <http://dx.doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btw354>`_                 |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| pandas      | `https://pandas.pydata.org/ <https://pandas.pydata.org/>`_     |                                                                     |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Python      | `https://www.python.org/ <https://www.python.org/>`_           |                                                                     |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| R           | `https://www.r-project.org/ <https://www.r-project.org/>`_     | R Core Team. R: A Language and Environment for Statistical          |
|             |                                                                | Computing. R Foundation for Statistical Computing, Vienna,          |
|             |                                                                | Austria, (2022).                                                    |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| SAMtools    | `https://github.com/samtools/samtools                          | `doi: 10.1093/gigascience/giab008                                   |
|             | <https://github.com/samtools/samtools>`_                       | <https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.1303.3997>`_                        |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Snakemake   | `https://github.com/snakemake/snakemake                        | `doi: 10.12688/f1000research.29032.1                                |
|             | <https://github.com/snakemake/snakemake>`_                     | <https://doi.org/10.12688/f1000research.29032.1>`_                  |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Somalier    | `https://github.com/brentp/somalier                            | `doi: 10.1186/s13073-020-00761-2                                    |
|             | <https://github.com/brentp/somalier>`_                         | <https://doi.org/10.1186/s13073-020-00761-2>`_                      |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Tabix       | `https://github.com/samtools/htslib                            | `doi: 10.1093/gigascience/giab007                                   |
|             | <https://github.com/samtools/htslib>`_                         | <https://doi.org/10.1093/gigascience/giab007>`_                     |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| VerifyBamID | `https://github.com/statgen/verifyBamI                         | `doi:  10.1016/j.ajhg.2012.09.004                                   |
|             | <https://github.com/statgen/verifyBamI>`_                      | <https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ajhg.2012.09.004>`_                      |
+-------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
